description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Fluidityk is a unique next-gen music visualizer: it uses realistic fluid dynamics (fire, smoke, oil and water) reacting to your own music for a beautiful and artistic result! Fluidityk's high resolution fluid simulation uses 100% of the Xbox360's processing power and works with music from your hard drive library or streamed from a Windows PC using Windows Media Player.
